title: Can anyone help me with these error codes
body:
Pulled these from the log, no idea what to make of them.

000001.855|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000001.855|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml
000001.855|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000001.856|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :\Bin\Data\C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.155/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml

will not launch into loading screen. I have reinstalled several times and still nothing worked.

replies.body: Unfortunately, these logs don't tell me too much.  is this happening on the patcher?  If so, is it at a certain percent?  A screenshot could help as well.  Let me know!
This is the screenshot.

Thanks for the info!  It looks like something is failing to render your game, which is causing the crash to occur.  You should go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this fixed up, as it will go over a few causes like game files and drivers.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It is not happening on the patcher. It only does this when I try and go into a game, the loading screen with all the champions will bug splat. I will include a screenshot tomorrow.
